hero.intro: Hello! I'm Bobby Ho. A passionate Full-stack React Developer from Hong Kong <emoji> üî•</emoji>

experience.title: Experience <emoji>üéØ</emoji>
experience.frontendDevelopment: I'm proficient in responsive web design. I can build application from basic CSS, HTML, Javascript or using frameworks like React and Next.js.
experience.backendDevelopment: I'm experienced in Node.js, Nest.js and Express.js. I can build APIs using DTO pattern for self-use or for third-party use such as Sanity CMS, Stripe payment and Shopify E-commerce; Integrate relational databases like Postgres or document databases like Firestore.
experience.passionateProgrammer: I love utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. Also enjoy writing clean, maintainable, and well-documented code to ensure code quality and best practices.
experience.teamPlayer: As a former HKUST Dragon Boat Team captain, I understand the importance of teamwork and enjoy being a team player. Therefore, I would bring this experience into the working environment to collaborate with cross-functional teams for high-quality product delivery.
